get.summary: Get All Process Values Of All Available Engines
get.description:
Returns all process value for all online process units (engines)
that the current user has access to.

schema.title: Response Get All Process Values Of All Available Engines

get.summary: Get Recent Run Method And State

post.description: This endpoint is just for exposing the topic enum to frontend via automatic type generation
Publish to all topics that start with 'MSW_'

RecentRun.title: RecentRun
RecentRun.description: Represents a historical run of a process unit.

TagDirection.title: TagDirection
TagDirection.description:
Specifies whether a tag is read from or written to hardware and whether is can be changed in UI.

Direction of the tag is in relation to the physical IO. Sensors are regarded as inputs and
actuators as outputs. Derived values are regarded as NA.
